channel.title: Google-Cloud-Platform on lust.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Google-Cloud-Platform on lust.dev

item.title: Building a Google Cloud Event Bridge for Okta Syslogs
item.description: Okta natively integrates with AWS EventBridge, but what about Google Cloud users? Here’s how to bridge that gap and unlock real-time alerting, org-wide Okta dashboards, and BigQuery Okta event archives.

item.title: Quick Upgrade Trick for App Engine Java 17
item.description: Quickly modernize your App Engine Java 8 codebase to run on Java 17!

item.title: Upgrading to Google Cloud Functions 2nd Gen
item.description: Take the leap, upgrade to 2nd Gen Google Cloud Functions!

item.title: Cloud Build Triggers: Excluding Branches
item.description: Exclude branches likes master from Cloud Build triggers
